description: Most vegetarian enchiladas use either beans or cheese in the filling, but this recipe uses tofu and sweet potatoes instead. .
keywords: Tofu Enchiladas, Tofu Enchiladas with Sweet Potato in Mole Sauce, vegetarian enchiladas
name: Tofu Enchiladas with Sweet Potato in Mole Sauce
recipeIngredient: 2 large sweet potatoes (baked or microwaved until tender)
1 12 oz package extra firm tofu, pressed for 30 minutes (I use the Tofu Xpress), drained and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1/4 cup cilantro (chopped, plus additional for garnish)
1 cup Monterey jack cheese (shredded, or crumbled queso fresco)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the coconut oil in large stockpot over medium heat. Add the onions and cook about 12 minutes, or until lightly browned. Add the garlic, chili powder, brown sugar, cinnamon, chipotle chili powder, and ground cloves and cook about 1 minute more, or until fragrant, stirring constantly.

Add the tomatoes, cocoa powder, peanut butter, and vegetable broth. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Allow to cool slightly and then puree with an immersion blender or transfer to a blender and blend until smooth. Set aside.
